text: Pen mam ay okok. Takaw apin anɨb ak, Apolos chɨlmɨŋal apin ak, nɨbi gos nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agɨl, nɨbop agñɨtep gebin. Nɨbi ke gos tɨpagɨl nopun agɨl ke tep gaknɨŋ, bɨ nɨbop ogɨnap yɨb kɨlop dad aplanɨgabɨm, bɨ nɨbop ogɨnap kɨlop kelɨgɨnɨgabɨm ak, anɨgɨl ma yɨbɨl gɨnɨmɨb apin. Pen buk Baybol tɨkɨl agɨlak tek gɨnɨmɨb, gos ke nepɨm tek ma gɨnɨmɨb apin.
